summary: I love challenges, I think they are fun and the perfect excuse to writ and share things.  And there is a new one from  Annie, WeblogPoMo AMA, that suggests doing AMA-inspired posts AMA
title: What do I do for work, and drink?

summary: I heard an interview with the Swedish author Per Hagman.  As a new parent, he explained that nights out and similar activities no longer appealed to him.  He described it as being "free from freedom"...
title: Free from Freedom
